name: Snowday (itch) (SilverGearInteractive)
description:
The neighborhood bully wants to destroy Maggie's snowman, help her keep it safe from his evil creations! Take to the top of your mighty castle and defend against the invading snowrauders. The fate of Maggie's perfect snowday is in your hands.

Entry for the GDC 2018-2019 Chill Jam

Credits:

Programming and Sounds - Michael A. Percy

Art Design - Vincent Santos Resto

Tools Used:

Audacity

Aseprite

Unity Engine
